original_title: School holiday period to be amended after O/L exam was postponed by two weeks
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lankan authorities have decided to amend the school holiday period after it was decided to postpone the 2022 G. C. E. Ordinary Level examination by two weeks.
The school term which commences on the 17th of April will continue until the 29th of May.
The Education Ministry said that the new school timetable will be announced soon.
The 2022 G. C. E. Ordinary Level examination will commence on the 29th of May and will continue until the 8th of June.
The Education Ministry said that the 2022 G. C. E. Ordinary Level examination was postponed due to the delay in marking the G. C. E. Advanced Level examination answer scripts.
However, the 2022 G. C. E. Ordinary Level examination will definitely take place on the rescheduled dates, said the Education Ministry.
